title: The Biggest Halloween Pumpkin
description: Children's Book: The Biggest Halloween Pumpkin   Halloween Bedtime Stories for Kids   It's almost Halloween and our little bird friend has decided to get a pumpkin for this special day. But not just any pumpkin will do! The red bird wants to get the BIGGEST one of allâ€”which he happens to find. But there is only one problem...how will the bird transport the huge pumpkin back home? Once again, the bird needs your help! Read along as you and your child will once again enjoy the silly antics of this quirky bird!  This is a read aloud kids book and is easy to read. The target age range audience is for toddlers, preschool and young children.   The Biggest Halloween Pumpkin is a book that any child will love, especially at bedtime. This book is suitable for parents to read to their children. Grandparents will definitely enjoy reading this book to their grandchildren.    Read this children's book FREE as part of your PRIME or Kindle Unlimited membership
author: V. Moua
